body: Hey so I logged onto my main account on the forums and I see all my infractions reset and then this https://gyazo.com/47139d449b648d32a91803e224adc6d3. Then I logged onto my alt and it is perfectly fine. Whats causing this?

title: Quick question...

replies.body: The website and server just undergoed a scheduled maintenance break, so expect a few bugs and glitches. Please report them www.github/Avicus/issues/issues
replies.body_tagged: The website and server just undergoed a scheduled maintenance break, so expect a few bugs and glitches. Please report them www.github/Avicus/issues/issues

replies.body:
Don't worry, once we have fixed this you will get all 30 infractions you had back :P

Just bare with us tho, i have no idea how long this will take. Once everything has been fixed there will be a post about it.
